roleset.name: yammer
roleset.note: YAMMER-V NOTES: Automatically created based on framefiles: moan (37.3), added by Kev (from yammer.01-v)

role.descr: Complaint, thing Yammered, topic of Yammering

example.name: Quotative
example.text: ["I wouldn't want any of that stuff inside of me,"]-1 he yammered *-1

roleset.name: yammer away
roleset.note: YAMMER_AWAY-V NOTES: Added by Julia to deal with the particle-inclusive examples in the yammer.01 frame. VN class actually belongs to 'yammer' without a particle, but the structure is the same. Ditto FN. (from yammer.02-v)

role.descr: Complaint, thing Yammered, topic of Yammering

example.name: just arg0
example.text: I stood there for three minutes while he yammered away on the phone and didn't even acknowledge me.

roleset.name: yammer on.. and on.. and on...
roleset.note: YAMMER_ON-V NOTES: Added by Julia to deal with the particle-inclusive examples in the yammer.01 frame. VN class actually belongs to 'yammer' without a particle, but the structure is the same. Ditto FN. (from yammer.03-v)

role.descr: Complaint, thing Yammered, topic of Yammering

example.name: both args
example.text: She yammered on about "do you trust this administration", and spewed more right-wing, bizarro-world talking points.
